channel.title: [Pi] Ginormous problem [Pi]
channel.description: I really really need help with this. Most of the objects in my server won't let me use them if I'm standing right next to them. I have to be a couple squares away to use most of them. Only some objects work no matter what distance I am away from them such as some stairs. Please help! :(

item.title: [Pi] Ginormous problem [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“b00mz1029, post:5, topic:522979”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=641471.msg4321540#msg4321540 date=1372271262]

clickobject packet… distance…common sense from there.

I still don’t know what to do. I’m in ClickObject.java and there are a ton of things that say something like c.objectDistance = (put number here)

case = itemid
objectdistance = number of squares away
[/quote]
So if the number of squares away is equal to 5, you can click the object anywhere within 5 squares and it will work right? And if it is set to 1, then you have to be right next to it to click it?[/quote]exactly

Read full topic

I still don’t know what to do. I’m in ClickObject.java and there are a ton of things that say something like c.objectDistance = (put number here)
[/quote]
case = itemid
objectdistance = number of squares away[/quote]
So if the number of squares away is equal to 5, you can click the object anywhere within 5 squares and it will work right? And if it is set to 1, then you have to be right next to it to click it?
